snippet: A team from the Chinese web services company was thrown out of a computer vision contest last week after organizers found they went far beyond the number of entries allowed.
abstract: A team from the Chinese web services company was thrown out of a computer vision contest last week after organizers found they went far beyond the number of entries allowed.

headline.main: Baidu Fires Researcher Tied to Contest Disqualification
headline.print_headline: Baidu Scientist Is Fired After Contest Violation
